item.title: Which U.S. Government Agencies Are Facilitating the Trump Administration’s Commercial Diplomacy in Africa?
item.description: President Trump’s formal approach to Africa is centered on “trade, not aid,” which has shifted the agencies and organizations responsible for facilitating the United States’ engagement with Africa.

item.title: Back in Play: U.S.-India Nuclear Partnership Finds a New Opening
item.description: India’s new nuclear law reopens the door to U.S.–India nuclear cooperation by fixing liability and opening the sector to private players—but whether this sparks real investment or remains a symbolic reset will hinge on regulation, costs, and realistic targets.
